name: ZomBard
description:
An amateur Bard has been kicked out of a village for being a terrible musician. Alone in the forest he is approached by a shadowy figure who offers him a magical flute where all who hear it will be captivated to listen. Shock twist! The flute is actually cursed and turned the bard into a zombie and all who hear him play are also turned to zombies.

The aim of t he game is to turn all the villagers into zombies.

Controls
Mouse Click to move
"Z" to play the flute
